logIn.verifyText: log in to verify your Email

error.SERVER_ERROR: Uuups, there was an error at the server!

insertRoadtrip.heading: make your own Roadtrip
insertRoadtrip.startText: Where do you want to start?
insertRoadtrip.destText: Where do you want to go?
insertRoadtrip.dateText: When do you want to start?
insertRoadtrip.descriptionText: Describe in a text who you are and what you want to do:

day.WRONG_DATA: Please enter a number for the day.
day.TOO_LOW: Plase enter a day bigger than one.
day.TOO_HIGH: Plase enter a day smaller than 32.

month.WRONG_pDATA: Please enter one of the months of the year.

year.WRONG_DATA: Please enter a number for the year.
year.TOO_HIGH: With 201 you can't do roadtrips anymore!:).
year.TOO_LOW: You should be at least 12 years old!.

Date.TOO_LOW: please select a date in the future.

land.WRONG_DATA: please only enter characters for the field "land".
land.TOO_LOW: please enter minimum two characters for a land.
land.TOO_HIGH: please enter maximum 100 characters for a land.

town.WRONG_DATA: please only enter characters for the field "town".
town.TOO_LOW: please enter minimum two characters for a town.
town.TOO_HIGH: please enter maximum 100 characters for a town.

dest.INVALID: start- and finishaddress need not to be the same.

description.WRONG_DATA: please only enter characters for the description.
description.TOO_LOW: please write a discription text of minimum 100 characters.

file.NO_DATA: Please select an image to upload.

name.NO_DATA: Please select an image with a name

ext.WRONG_DATA: Please select an image of the type: tiff, jpg, jpeg oder png hoch

size.WRONG_DATA: please upload an image with a size.
size.TOO_HIGH: please upload an image with maximum 7Mb.
size.TOO_LOW: please upload an image with minimum 5Kb.

email.WRONG_FORMAT: This sequence of characters is not formatted like an email is.

password.WRONG_FORMAT: The password should contain a small letter, a capital letter and number.

day.WRONG_DATA: Please enter a number for the day.
day.TOO_LOW: Plase enter a day bigger than one.
day.TOO_HIGH: Plase enter a day smaller than 32.

month.WRONG_pDATA: Please enter one of the months of the year.

year.WRONG_DATA: Please enter a number for the year.
year.TOO_HIGH: With 201 you can't do roadtrips anymore!:).
year.TOO_LOW: You should be at least 12 years old!.

sex.WRONG_DATA: Plase enter one of the given sexes below

viewRoadtrip.introduction: ["wants to make a roadtrip from", "too", ".", "It should start on the", "."," He "," She", "has written the following:"]

noData.heading: No messages to see yet.
noData.paragraph: Write to somebody by clicking on a roadtrip and send him a message.

modalUser.heading: Do you really want to delete the account?
modalUser.action: Type in "Delete" to delete the account

noContent.heading: Here roadtrips will be displayed.
noContent.paragraph: Your did not upload a roadtrip yet. Click on "make a roadtrip" to start your own trip and find travelpartners.

modalRoadtrip.heading: Do you really want to delete the roadtrip?

resend-validation.headline: Your verification email has been sent again.
resend-validation.paragraph: Click on the link in the email and login to verify your address. If the email doesn't arrive, check your spam folder or see if your inbox might be full. Otherwise, check the settings of your email provider

new-password.headline: Email sent to reset your password.
new-password.paragraph: Click on the link in the email and enter your new password, to set a new password.

registered.headline: You are registered. Please verify your email.
registered.paragraph: We have sent you an verification-email with a link. Please clickt the link and login.

verificationEmail.subject: , bestätige die Existenz
verificationEmail.text3: . With this Email we are sending you the confirmation-link to validate that your email address actually exists.
